name: Mapping Extensions
description: This adds a host of new things you can do with your maps as a mapper, and allows you to play said maps as a player. An update of the port of the PC original mod by Kyle 1413. Previously maintained by zoller27osu.
author: StackDoubleFlow,  rxzz0,  rcelyte
description_zh: 为谱师设计谱面提供一些新的东西。如果你是玩家，这个模组能让你游玩一些依赖此模组的谱面。这是一个移植自PC版本的模组（来自Kyle 1413）。原先由zoller27osu维护。
